description.excerpt: For more information about the library, visit the website:
Library McKernel. Pseudo-random numbers generated with functions of hashing. Suitable for distributed applications. Recommended.
McKernel: A Library for Approximate Kernel Expansions in Log-linear Time.

excerpt.body: McKernel introduces a framework to use kernel approximates in the mini-batch setting with Stochastic Gradient Descent (SGD) as an alternative to Deep Learning. McKernel establishes the foundation of a new architecture of learning that allows to obtain large-scale non-linear classification combining lightning kernel expansions and a linear classifier. It travails in the mini-batch setting working analogously to Neural Networks.
excerpt.name: McKernel
